title: Karma Tester Task Configuration
description: Defines parameters for the Karma testing utility

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

karmaConfigPath.title: Path to the karma config file
karmaConfigPath.description: Sets the path to the Karma Configuration file to use. If one has not been created, this task will prompt the user to run it again with the --initkarma flag.
